TopicTitle: What do you want to see in .23

Articles.Content:
Dust effects when jumping around on planets.

Wheel sounds when touching down with an aircraft.

A mouse cursor that is more fitting to the game instead of the generic Microsoft one (most games have their own).

Particle effects when launching (I think this was in before).

Walking sounds especially on Kerbin (every game has walking sounds)

Better IVA (non-mod)

From what I've seen, these are among the most common requests for future releases:

  • Resources (surveying, mining, refining etc.)
  • Improved aerodynamics model
  • Improved buoyancy model
  • Improved heating model
  • Fixed wobble model
  • A greater variety of visual effects (shock diamonds, tyre tracks)
  • A greater variety of sound effects (remember landing leg activation?)
  • Sound reduction in vacuum
  • Planet-specific music
  • IVA crew transfer
  • IVAs for existing parts
  • Improved parts catalogue
  • Life support

Personally, I'd like to see:

  • Planet discovery (low-resolution map-view planets until close encounters with probes with cameras, initially hidden small bodies)
  • Weather
  • Movable parts
  • Story-driven missions and progression.
  • Hardmode with internal views/cameras only, programmable probes with LoS communications and signal delay
  • Part damage (explosions create shrapnel, fuel tanks can be punctured, more semi-working states for parts like wheels and solar panels have)
  • A full launch escape system with the features of Prilla LES (stacks over parachute, separate sideways decoupling motor), and the stock appearance of KSPX's LES.

Edited October 15, 2013 by pizzaoverhead
Added links.

Is there anyone here who would object or not use pintles and gudgeons?

They present no problems here but only, and I stress only, if accompanied by quarter knees and stern posts.

I'll be pretty happy with whatever they come up with next, however:

I'm most looking forward to how the full resource system will develop with it's own parts, tech tree sections and how the need for science in the particular biomes could be used to discover & unlock the resource system's various aspects. I think that would be a great move as it all ties together and provides even greater emphasis for R&D.

Yes, I want all the other stuff too, naturally.

resources

re-entry heat

landing-point prediction on athmospheric planets

apoapsis prediction after aerobraking

land-base parts

more planets

better aerodynamics

.......

I'd be happy with any of those. But please not again an entire update only focused on career-mode!!!!
Resources. Please. Must. Have. Soon. Please. Squad. Everyone. Wants. Them. Please.
Economy - The ability to obtain money and spend it on parts.
I hope they don't add resources, it's kind of funny watching everyone complain.

I hope they don't add resources, it's kind of funny watching everyone complain.

Don't worry, there's always multiplayer to fall back on

Is announcing a release date going to be a consistent thing now? And does anyone know it for 0.23?

Is announcing a release date going to be a consistent thing now? And does anyone know it for 0.23?

Oh I know! It will be 10/15/2385
Better aerodynamics, reentry heat, optimization, and 64-bit KSP (although Squad had already said they will not make a 64-bit version, I am NOT asking.)

Why are you people already asking about 0.23 when 0.22 has not even been released yet? One thing at a time.

In addition, are you seriously wasting your time asking for a release date of 0.23? With the exception of tonight, I cannot think of a single time Squad has let us know exactly when an update is coming, and the date for the next major update, which is very likely several months away, sure as heck wouldn't be known by anyone right now anyway. Give them a break, there are thousands of us and only a few of them. There will probably be several small patches in the next few days, we can all be excited for those. But don't spam the forum with threads about 0.23 yet. Not the time.

64 bit windows,

multi threaded physics.

bigger load distance

memory optimization.
I want to see .22 XP
More prefurmance fixes. Reasources. More parts. Kerbal Warp Drives. Another star system or 100.
I Wish they would say. F*ck unity! This engine clearly sucks for KSP...
MOAR BOOSTERS (Parts)!!!!!!!

I would like to see SQUAD storm the Unity dev offices, and hold them at gunpoint while they get off their arses and make a stable x64 version of Unity so we can finally have all the mods we want without worrying about maxing out the ram.
